extDescription.message: Automatically organize your tabs into groups based on domain

groupByDomain.description: Button to group tabs by domain

sortTabs.description: Button to sort tabs in groups

noGroups.description: Message when no tab groups are found

autoGroupByDomain.description: Option to automatically group tabs by domain

autoGroupOnCreation.message: Automatically group new tabs when created
autoGroupOnCreation.description: Option to automatically group new tabs when created

groupByRootDomain.message: Group by root domain (e.g., group docs.example.com and forum.example.com together)
groupByRootDomain.description: Option to group by root domain

ignoreTLD.message: Ignore top-level domain (e.g., group example.com and example.org together)

useDynamicColors.message: Use dynamic colors (automatically assign different colors to different domains)

tabSortingDesc.message: Choose how tabs should be sorted within groups:

enableTabSorting.message: Enable automatic tab sorting within groups
enableTabSorting.description: Option to enable automatic tab sorting

groupSortingDesc.message: Choose how tab groups should be sorted:
groupSortingDesc.description: Description for tab group sorting section

enableGroupSorting.description: Option to enable automatic tab group sorting

sortByDomain.description: Option to sort tabs by domain

sortByTitle.description: Option to sort tabs by title

sortByAccessTime.description: Option to sort tabs by access time

sortByCreateTime.description: Option to sort tabs by creation time

sortByFrequency.description: Option to sort tabs by usage frequency

sortByColor.description: Option to sort groups by color

sortBySize.description: Option to sort groups by number of tabs

sortByLastAccessed.description: Option to sort groups by last accessed time

sortAscending.message: Sort in ascending order (A-Z, oldest first)
sortAscending.description: Option to sort in ascending order

excludedDomainsDesc.message: Tabs from these domains will not be automatically grouped:

noDomains.description: Message when no domains are excluded

pleaseEnterDomain.description: Error message when domain is empty

domainAlreadyInList.message: Domain is already in the list
domainAlreadyInList.description: Error message when domain is already in the list

domainAdded.description: Success message when domain is added

domainRemoved.description: Success message when domain is removed

errorSavingSettings.description: Error message when settings cannot be saved

settingsSaved.description: Success message when settings are saved

tabsGrouped.description: Success message when tabs are grouped

errorGroupingTabs.description: Error message when tabs cannot be grouped

tabsUngrouped.description: Success message when tabs are ungrouped

errorUngroupingTabs.description: Error message when tabs cannot be ungrouped

tabsSorted.description: Success message when tabs are sorted

errorSortingTabs.description: Error message when tabs cannot be sorted

groupsSorted.description: Success message when tab groups are sorted

errorSortingGroups.description: Error message when tab groups cannot be sorted

noGroupsToSort.description: Message when there are no tab groups to sort

errorLoadingGroups.description: Error message when tab groups cannot be loaded
